errors.error_description: Changed Python version requirement from 3.10 to 3.8, creating version compatibility issues
Added poetry install command in the wrong execution order, after Docker operations instead of in environment setup
correction_candidates: Remove the poetry install command from the deployment section
Move poetry install to the environment preparation section
Replace poetry install with pip install
Add poetry shell after poetry install in deployment section
errors.golden_answer: Remove the poetry install command from the deployment section
